Package org.bonitasoft.engine.bdm.validator.rule

Class ValidationRule<T,R>

java.lang.Object
org.bonitasoft.engine.bdm.validator.rule.ValidationRule<T,R>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of element that this validation rule supports
R - the type of the result of the validation
Direct Known Subclasses:
AggregationAndCompositionValidationRule, BusinessObjectModelValidationRule, BusinessObjectValidationRule, CyclicCompositionValidationRule, FieldValidationRule, IndexValidationRule, MultipleAggregationToItselfValidationRule, QueryParameterValidationRule, QueryValidationRule, SimpleFieldValidationRule, UniqueConstraintValidationRule, UniqueNameValidationRule, UniquenessCompositionValidationRule, UniqueSimpleNameValidationRule
public abstract class ValidationRule<T,R> extends Object
Validates an object of type T and returns a validation result of type R
Author:
Romain Bioteau, Emmanuel Duchastenier
